question: What is the purpose of the NR Coverage and Capacity Optimization (CCO) function? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: To detect and mitigate coverage and cell edge interference issues

question: What standard is Link Aggregation currently standardized in? [IEEE 802.3]

What is the unit of specific absorption rate (SAR)? [IEEE C95.1]

answer: The STA has not received any group addressed frames during the measurement period.

question: At what electric field strength can approximately 50% of standing adults perceive a 60 Hz field in an outdoor environment? [IEEE C95.1]

answer: To establish a Multi Access (MA) PDU Session for data communication between the UE and UPF

question: What modifications were made to PC5 for V2V use cases? [3GPP Release 14]

answer: To inform the RAN node that the redirect is finished and to forward the NAS message to the UE

question: Which platform provides necessary functionalities related to service management and orchestration?

answer: A NPUSCH containing data and reference symbols

question: Which message does the gNB-DU include in the non-UE associated INITIAL UL RRC MESSAGE TRANSFER message? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: To request location information for target UEs

question: Which pair of wires is connected to pin 3 and pin 6 in the 10/100Base-T connector? [IEEE 802.3]

What does MCG stand for in 5G? [3GPP Release 15]

According to the Federal Communications Commission (FCC) regulations, what is the non-occupancy period if a radar signal is detected?

answer: Activation of management services for UEs in a specified area

question: How is V2X authorization between the UE and the V2X Control Function conducted? [3GPP Release 14]

answer: To transmit HARQ feedback for unicast and groupcast

question: What does a UE do with a BWP inactivity timer for a cell when the timer is running? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: Decrements the timer at the end of a subframe or half subframe

question: What is NFV power consumption? [ETSI NFV Release 5]
answer: Power consumption associated with virtualized resources and containerized workloads

question: Which PDCP packet duplication is supported in LTE for improving reliability? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: For Data Radio Bearers (DRBs) using RLC AM

question: When can emergency calls be established without the need to dial a dedicated number? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Option 4 and subject to operator policy and regional regulations, restricted local operator service access

question: Which element can use the identifier of the MSC/SGSN to determine the operator selected by a supporting UE or the operator allocated to a UE? [3GPP Release 17]
What does ELF stand for in the context of frequency bands? [IEEE C95.1]
What is the primary advantage of using directional antennas in wireless networks? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: They have higher sensitivity to radio signals in the dominant direction.

question: What is the disadvantage of address filtering in wireless networks? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: It can easily be overridden by an attacker

question: In a shared network, how can the share of usage of the shared core network node(s) between the sharing partners be distinguished? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: By the identity of the serving core network operator

question: What does the SMF determine when it receives notification on the requested analytics from the NWDAF? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Which UEs the SMF needs to provide the analytics information to

question: Which logical channel is used for transmitting control information between UEs and the network? [3GPP Release 18]

answer: Both session inactivity time monitoring event and traffic volume exchanged between the UE and the AI/ML application server

question: Which document contains the requirements needed for the 5G system to support 5G LAN-type services? [3GPP Release 16]

answer: To offer common services to the verticals industry applications and V2X applications

question: What does the NWDAF provide in the response or notification on 'QoS Sustainability'? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: QoS change statistics and Reporting Threshold(s)

question: What does the UE consider the term 'radio bearer' (RB) to cover? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: To establish a new RRC connection for the UE in the target gNB-DU

question: What is the mapping function for determining the RAW slot index? [IEEE 802.11]

answer: Page UE(s) in a restricted area using certain SSB(s)

question: Are the MuD and MiD services mutually exclusive? [3GPP Release 16]
answer: No, they can both be used at the same time

question: What does the CG-CandidateList message in ASN.1 define? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: The SCG radio configuration for one or more candidate cells for Conditional PSCell Addition (CPA) or Conditional PSCell Change (CPC)

question: Which interface is used to support mobility and bearer management between the MME and S-GW? [3GPP Release 17]

What is the main goal of the Service & Computation Orchestrator framework?
answer: To select the most effective computation method for the implemented Quantum Resistant Security Algorithm

question: At what frequency range do human tests reveal painful sensations at approximately 50 mA for 50% of the subjects? [IEEE C95.1]

answer: Changes in membrane morphology and cell surface charge distribution

question: What is the purpose of the SN Addition Request message? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: To indicate the request of SCG activation or deactivation

question: What is the purpose of the MulteFire Primary Synchronization Signal (MF-PSS) and MulteFire Secondary Synchronization Signal (MF-SSS)?
answer: Support UE in frequency/time synchronization and differentiate between LAA and MulteFire eNodeBs

question: What is the purpose of Address Resolution Protocol (ARP)? [TCP/IP]
answer: To resolve IP addresses to MAC addresses

question: What is the ability of a network to maintain an acceptable level of service in the event of various faults and challenges to normal operation called?
Where can full details of operation under the 'Access class barred list' be found? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: Management information represented by information models

question: What does a UE expect when it cancels a PUSCH or an SRS transmission? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: To be scheduled by a second DCI format for transmission over symbols that include cancelled symbols

question: What is the purpose of the Common API Framework (CAPIF) for 3GPP Northbound APIs? [3GPP Release 16]
answer: To define a standard API framework for 3rd party Application Servers

question: How many slices can a UE (User Equipment) access at a time?

answer: The AUSF exchanges AAA protocol messages with a potentially external AAA Server

question: What is the term used to refer to the management and orchestration of services? [ETSI NFV Release 5]

answer: To define HEVC-based 8K TV operation point and media decoding capabilities

question: Which organization is responsible for regulating the use of the RF spectrum in the United States? [IEEE 802.11]

answer: To allow for direct warnings to be sent to mobile users

question: What information is provided by the SMF to the UPF during the N4 Session Establishment procedure? [3GPP Release 18]

answer: To indicate the directions (transmit-only or receive-only) of the GTSs in the superframe

question: What are the key performance indicators (KPI) for the Steer to waypoints C2 mode?
answer: Message interval: < 1 s, Max UAV speed: 300 km/h, Message size: 100 byte, Latency: 1 s, Positive ACK: Required

question: What is the definition of 'Minimum power consumption'? [ETSI NFV Release 5]
answer: The smallest value of power consumption at a specific time

question: In online charging with reservation, what happens if the resource usage execution fails? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: The OCS returns the reserved amount back to the subscriber account.

question: What is the purpose of the sequence numbers added to each encapsulated packet in GRE-based L3 overlay tunneling?

answer: Advanced monitoring solutions for providing communication service quality

question: What does the gNB do with the UE UTRA-FDD capabilities? [3GPP Release 18]

answer: To analyze the reliability performance of FB-CSs

question: How many US-NSIs must be offered for a V2X (vehicle to everything) communication system with three use cases?

answer: A network where multiple access points serve a single user

question: Which service is used to change the access point gateway for a mobile station in a wireless network? [IEEE 802.11]

What is the purpose of the Link Layer Discovery Protocol (LLDP)? [IEEE 802.3]
answer: Distribution of information about network participants

question: What capability should the 5G system provide for a UE to assist another UE in ranging of a third UE? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: Capability to perform distance and/or angle measurement.

question: What is the purpose of the Access Traffic Steering, Switch, and Splitting (ATSSS) feature? [3GPP Release 16]
answer: To establish a PDU Session that can use one 3GPP access network and one non-3GPP access network simultaneously

question: When can a UE determine PDCCH monitoring occasions for a search space set in the active DL BWP? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: If the active DL BWP has same SCS configuration and cyclic prefix as the initial DL BWP

question: What does the Un interface in E-UTRAN support? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: Relaying between the RN and the DeNB

question: Which protocol is represented by the value '11h' in the Protocol field of the IP header? [TCP/IP]

answer: By maintaining their own local TSF timers

question: What drives the need for secure mechanisms to establish or refresh credentials and subscriptions in IoT devices? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: Long life spans of IoT devices

question: What is the purpose of the Work Item 'Enhancement of Private Network support for NG-RAN'? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: To support IMS voice and emergency services for SNPN

question: What are the main functionalities of the Enhancement of support for Edge Computing feature in the 5G Core network? [3GPP Release 17]

question: What is the purpose of a local DNS server? [TCP/IP]
answer: To store DNS data for verifying hosts

question: What is the purpose of the advanced driving use case in NR-V2X?
answer: To share local sensing information with each other

question: What is the main benefit of the extended sensors use case in NR-V2X?
answer: Enhanced perception, planning, and control in road users

question: Which sublayer is responsible for transfer of upper layer PDUs? [3GPP Release 18]

answer: To track the location and status of specific service group users

question: What is included in the UE CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message in the Intra-CU topology adaptation procedure in SA? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: Priority value indicated by SCI format 1-A associated with the PSFCH

answer: The network informs the mobile station by means of a NOTIFY message

question: When does the SPC switch to the channel allocated to the TMCTP-child PAN coordinator? [IEEE 802.15.4]
answer: Before the DBS slot time allocated to the TMCTP-child PAN coordinator

question: What is the theoretical weakness in RC4 that is exploited in attacks on WEP? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: Weakness in the key scheduling algorithm

Which penetration loss model is applicable to RMa? [3GPP Release 18]

answer: It is not mapped to symbols that contain SS/PBCH block from the serving cell

question: According to the International Energy Agency (IEA) summary report, for every bit of data forwarded on the network, how many bits of data are transmitted within and among data centres? [ETSI NFV Release 5]

answer: The communication path between PIN Elements can use licensed and unlicensed spectrum as well as 3GPP and non-3GPP access.

answer: To support Non-IP Data Delivery using SCEF and SGi

answer: EAS address information, DNN, S-NSSAI, and AF Identifier

answer: To provide orientation and guide technical discussions in the field of industrial automation

answer: To provide Target NSSAI and RFSP to RAN to steer the UE to another cell

answer: When the cell broadcasts several PLMN IDs

question: How can the K-factor of LOS channel models be changed? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: By scaling the powers and re-normalizing the delay spread

What is the purpose of the O-RAN alliance?

answer: To store information about broadcast and multicast MBS Sessions

question: Which organization controls the use of IP addresses? [TCP/IP]

answer: By invoking the N2 overload procedure to 5G-AN nodes

question: Which VLANs limit the problem of broadcast messages? [IEEE 802.3]

answer: All serving cells belong to one DRX group

question: What does the 5G LAN VN group service charging specify? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: Charging support for 5G Virtual Network group management

question: How does a Multi-USIM UE indicate to the network that it does not accept the paging and requests to return to CM-IDLE state? [3GPP Release 17]
answer: By sending a Reject Paging response to the network.

answer: To avoid Ping Pong effect during handovers

question: Which cache is mandatory for an individually addressed PV1 Management frame? [IEEE 802.11]

answer: To support the page slicing mechanism

question: What are the performance objectives for the Evolved Packet System? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: When it runs out of frames to transmit

question: What is the term used when a bridge is equipped with more than two network ports? [IEEE 802.3]

answer: To derive the value of other interframe spaces

question: Which subcarriers are assigned as pilot subcarriers? [IEEE 802.11]

answer: Monitor phase, transmission phase, and suspension phase

When is a cross-over cable required? [IEEE 802.3]
What is the purpose of the APSD subfield in the TS Info field? [IEEE 802.11]

answer: To transfer the handover command as generated by the target gNB

question: What frequency bands does the standard address? [IEEE C95.1]
answer: 0 Hz to 100 kHz, 100 kHz to 6 GHz, 6 GHz to 300 GHz

question: What are the abilities provided by subscription-related priority mechanisms? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Invoking, modifying, and maintaining QoS Flows with priority

question: What is the purpose of the Training request (TRQ) subfield in the Link Adaptation Control subfield? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: Indicates whether the responder is requested to transmit a sounding PPDU

question: Which symbols are included in the last slots of a slot configuration period? [3GPP Release 17]

answer: To control physical processes over a network

question: What is the purpose of the MAP (multi-antenna processing) in CF (Cell-free) mMIMO (massive multiple-input-multiple-output)?

answer: To define common capabilities for mission critical services

question: How long can the SDT procedure last? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Until a SDT failure detection timer expires.

question: Where is the PCI Optimization Function specified? [3GPP Release 17]
What does redundant transmission at the transport layer in URLLC require? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Two disjoint transport paths between UPF and NG-RAN.

question: What is an Internet socket? [TCP/IP]
answer: A software term for a socket that organizes the folders and the links of an application on the endpoint

question: How is the contention window size determined in the LBT (listen-before-talk) algorithm for transmitting PDSCH (Physical Downlink Shared Channel) in LAA (LTE-U Licensed Spectrum Access)?
answer: It is determined based on the device's priority class

answer: Support for enhanced Service Enabler Architecture Layer (SEAL)

question: What does the feature 'Enhanced status (on-network)' enable for the MCData service? [3GPP Release 15]
answer: Sharing the current MCData system defined status

question: What is the distinction between the transmitter and the source in 802.11 frames? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: The transmitter sends the frame on to the wireless medium, while the source creates the frame

question: Who can the AF belong to? [3GPP Release 18]
answer: Both the operator and a third party

question: What channel carries the MulteFire system information broadcast (SIB-MulteFire)?

answer: The BSSID is including an MDE in its Beacon frames

answer: DL TDOA, DL AoD, UL TDOA, UL AoA (Azimuth and Zenith), Multi-RTT, NR E-CID

question: What happens if a station fails to send a buffered frame announced with an ATIM? [IEEE 802.11]
answer: The frame is transmitted in the next ATIM window

question: Which enhancement is applicable to 'on-network' operation in MCPTT service? [3GPP Release 14]

answer: Obtaining its own geographical location or transferring it to another LCS client

answer: UE is not at cell edge and UE mobility status
